document.full_text: portugal signed up to a "tough but fair" 78-billion-euro international bailout plan on thursday which will send it into recession for two years with a recovery only likely in 2013, european union and imf officials said.
document.title: portugal bailout "tough, but fair," recovery distant
lines_and_colors: portugal signed up to a "tough but fair" 78-billion-euro international bailout plan on thursday which will send it into recession for two years with a recovery only likely in 2013, european union and imf officials said.
